your castle in the air!
Superbly spacious. Lavish in luxury. The TWA
747 is everything a passenger plane should
be--because it has everything our passengers
asked for. Our survey of over 300,000 air
travelers told us what was needed and what
was wanted even before we began. We asked
questions. And got the answers. You'll find
them when you step aboard the TWA 747.
